posts.message:
Are you working on a graduation project!
Have a project idea!
Want to create team!
Can't manage a timeline!

Don't worry; Give us that responsibility, let us to rearrange your thought.
You are invited to our FREE session "Project Management" on Monday 17th March 2014 in AAST Cairo.

Learn how to manage your project in a professional way.

Register Now @ foe.pitechnologies.net
posts.caption: Project Management Session
posts.description:
For all students who:
- Are working on a graduation project
- Have a project idea 
- Want to create team
- Can't manage a timeline 
=======================================
HURRY UP!!! & register for the session @ http://www.foe.pitechnologies.net/index.php#register
=======================================
IEEE AAST Cairo-SB in a partnership with @[168795867986:274:PiTechnologies] ICT company is pleased to invite you to our FREE session "Project Management" to present the most common problems facing students managing their projects to its final output. A professional trainer from Pitecnologies will conduct the session discussing the main points to manage your project in a professional way through:
* Team work
* Time management
* project marketing 
* Planning & meetings
* Tasks distribution 
and more...
=====================================
whatever your academic year or your major is, you are welcome to attend since it is an general session that meets every student needs to get a project done successfully.
=======================================
The session will be held in
------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Arab Academy for Science, Technology and Maritime transportation Cairo campus in sheraton heliopolis 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enginnering building (A)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dr. Gamal Mokhtar hall  
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Date: Monday 17th March 2014 @ 12:00 pm 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Don't forget to register and check your e-mail to get your confirmation code.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hope to see you there :)

posts.description: In the era of cloud and XaaS (everything as a service), REST/SOAP-based web services have become ubiquitous within eBay’s platform. We dynamically monitor and manage a large and rapidly growing number of web servers deployed on our infrastructure and systems.

posts.message:
Web Designer required in Riyadh

Responsibilities:
1-Create cross-browser, cross-platform compatible HTML/XHTML/HTML5 websites.
2- Convert Photoshop layouts into HTML.
3- Managing and updating website content.
4-Develop/implement needed animation of webpage elements using modern JavaScript frameworks (JQuery).
Skills:
1- Experience in HTML, XHTML, CSS.
2- In-depth knowledge in HTML5+CSS3+JQuery implementations.
3- Working experience in the implementation of modern JavaScript frameworks (JQuery).
4- Experience in User Interface and Web design programs.

If you are interested, please send your CV to HR@tp.net.sa
